tables.name: crescent_blocks
tables.description: Cosmos Blocks Table: This table provides information about blocks created in the Cosmos ecosystem. It contains details such as block height and timestamp, validators, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Unique identifier for a block within a blockchain network

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when a block was created or added to the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Indentifier for a specific blockchain network or chain

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: Address of the validator that created and proposed a block

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: Hash value of the combination of validators active in a block

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when block data was ingested into the database

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: Total amount of bytes used to transmit messages in a block

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: Total number of transactions included within a block

tables.name: crescent_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains various attributes of events from the cosmos blockchain ecosystem, providing insights into the transaction and block-level data.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block in which the event was included

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Identifier for the specific blockchain network the event occurred on

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique hash identifying a transaction

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index of the event within a transaction

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event (e.g. transaction, governance, staking, etc.)

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: Source or type of entity that triggered the event

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: Key for a key-value pair within an event

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: Value associated with a key-value pair within an event

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: Index of a key-value pair within an event

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp for the block in which the event was included

tables.name: crescent_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains a detailed view of blockchain events in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing attributes about each event occurrence. The attributes are gathered from a variety of blockchain sources.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of block in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction in the blockchain

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Sequential index of messages within a transaction on IBC

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Sequential index of events during message processing on IBC

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event triggered by message processing on IBC

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: Key for an attribute associated with an event on IBC

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: Value for an attribute associated with an event on IBC

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: Index of attributes within an event on IBC

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested into the system

tables.name: crescent_transactions
tables.description: This table contains transaction information from the Cosmos ecosystem, including their status, fees, and associated block information. It provides a comprehensive view of interactions within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Current block position in the blockchain sequence

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Identifier of the Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Transaction hash ensuring unique transaction identification

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Raw or formatted transaction data in JSON format

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: Transaction operation message indicating success or failure

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Transaction memo providing context or metadata

columns.name: fee
columns.description: Transaction fee in base denomination and coins

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: Transaction execution outcome (e.g., success, failure)

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Transaction index within a block or batch

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: Cumulative gas used for transaction execution

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: Transaction's initial gas request for execution

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Time blockchain transaction data was ingested

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Data schema version for transaction information

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: Denomination of fee paid for transaction execution

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: Account or address granting fees for transaction execution

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: Account or address paying fees for transaction execution

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: Transaction's maximum allowed gas for execution

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Transaction execution mode in single-sign scenario

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: Transaction payload for multi-signature execution

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: Transaction expiration height in a distributed network

tables.name: crescent_tx_messages
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Transaction Messages: This table contains raw data from transaction messages on various Cosmos chains. It provides a detailed view of the messages exchanged between validators in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The numbered position of a block in the blockchain sequence.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: An identifier for the blockchain network or chain version.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for a transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The position of a transaction within a block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The position of a message within a transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The category or type of blockchain event or action.

columns.name: message
columns.description: A detailed description or data associated with a transaction or event.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The current data format or schema used by the blockchain.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The time the data was ingested or added to the dataset.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The time when the block was created in the blockchain sequence.
